text: Similar to this https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48692 and based on the discussion made there, PATCH requests with application/x-www-form-urlencoded should be parsed.
creator: liakoskonstantin@gmail.com

text:
parseBodyMethods supports arbitrary method names.

Note that the Servlet spec does not require support for RFC 5789 and unless you explicitly code your servlet to handle that method it will be rejected.
creator: markt@apache.org
